name: Duel Shots: Clash Of Guns
description:
Take a cool burger gun, test yourself and your reaction in dynamic 1v1 duels against AMAZING shooters. Shoot and win matches with amazing headshots and show how you use amazing weapons. 

UNLOCK AND UPGRADE AMAZING SHOOTERS

Collect and improve your amazing Duel Shots Shooters who have amazing skills. Upgrade the amazing level of your amazing shooters to increase your amazing power and take your enemies by amazing surprise.

IMPROVE YOUR AMAZING WEAPONS

Discover a ton of crazy and amazing weapons that shoot lollipops or slippery sausages. Upgrade amazing guns and surprise enemies with amazing skills.

BECOME THE BEST IN AMAZING DUELS

The main thing is to have time to aim and make an amazing headshot. Like a badass cowboy in the wild west in a crazy western. Shoot first, and give the heat with your amazing superpowers. Hit enemies with an amazing rainbow or shoot an amazing fireball at them. Just try this amazing adrenaline gameplay and you won't be able to tear yourself away.

GET AMAZING REWARDS

Get amazing daily rewards. Fight to unlock amazing new shooters with amazing weapons, amazing skills, and amazing game modes!

BE AMAZING IN AN AMAZING SPOTLIGHT

It gets more fun with amazing daily missions! Come back and complete amazing different quests to get great amazing rewards every day.

AMAZING FEATURES:

– Dynamic and amazing gameplay with amazing graphics.

– Fight other amazing shooters in fast and amazing duels.

– Improve your amazing character, equip him with amazing guns and unlock his special amazing abilities.

– New amazing shooters, amazing weapons and amazing events are being added all the time!

– Packs of amazing cards to improve amazing guns and amazing shooters.

– Daily amazing quests for more amazing fun and amazing rewards!

Regular amazing updates and amazing events that will not let you get bored. New amazing content, amazing features, amazing fighters and unusual amazing weapons are constantly being added to the game.
